name: Waves of Vapor
description:
Are you ready to become A E S T H E T I C ?

This game is a 6-level shmup in which you play as Pink Triangle With A Green Square In The Middle, who's trying to Become Vaporwave. It contains an all-"original" soundtrack which will blow your vapes off.


Some tips:

When shooting, your movement is slowed, making dodging easier, but getting away from dangerous zones becomes harder.

Your shield+laser takes quite some time to recharge. Choose wether you want to use it for offense or that one moment of defense.

Only bullets hurt, not the enemies themselves.

Your hurtbox, the box where bullets can hit you, is really obvious and really green.

Have fun and don't forget to follow for more if you liked it!
